homeBanner.title: Where Technology Meets Creativity
homeBanner.text: From coding your next big idea to shaping its global identity — Buyontech turns your vision into an unstoppable digital force.

aboutSection.title: About
aboutSection.text: We create secure, scalable, and modern digital solutions designed to fit your business goals. Our focus is on turning ideas into powerful products that help you grow.

serviceSection.title: Services
serviceSection.mobileAppDesc: We design and build user-friendly mobile applications for iOS and Android, tailored to your business needs.
serviceSection.frontendDesc: The website is optimized for both mobile and desktop with a fast and aesthetic interface.
serviceSection.backendDesc: A powerful management system is built for handling products, orders, and users.
serviceSection.domainDesc: Your website’s domain name is registered and hosted on a reliable server.
serviceSection.designDesc: A modern design is created, ensuring a smooth and user-friendly experience.
serviceSection.adminDesc: A simple and easy-to-use management panel is provided for business owners.
serviceSection.paymentDesc: Customers can pay via card, cash, or bank transfer.
serviceSection.seoDesc: Optimization is applied so your website ranks better on Google and other search engines.
serviceSection.technicDesc: Continuous technical support and regular updates are provided after launch.

faqs.question: What technologies do you use for web development?
faqs.answer: We use modern and proven technologies like *React, Next.js, ASP.NET Core, Node.js, and PostgreSQL* to create secure, scalable, and high-performance digital platforms.

faqs.question: Can you integrate third-party tools and APIs?
faqs.answer: Yes — we can seamlessly integrate *payment systems, CRM tools, analytics, chatbots*, and any other third-party services your business needs. Our goal is to make all your tools work together effortlessly.

faqs.question: Do you provide post-launch support and maintenance?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. After your project goes live, our team continues to support it — handling updates, monitoring performance, and ensuring everything runs smoothly as your business grows.

faqs.question: How do you ensure the security and reliability of your projects?
faqs.answer: Security is our top priority. We use *encrypted data storage, authentication protocols (JWT / OAuth), SSL certificates, and server-side validation* to ensure complete protection and stability.

faqs.question: What is your development process like?
faqs.answer: We follow five key stages:Research → Design → Development → Testing → Support.This approach keeps the process clear, agile, and transparent.

faqs.question: Do you work with international clients?
faqs.answer: Yes — BuyonTech collaborates with clients worldwide. Our solutions are multilingual, globally scalable, and designed to adapt to any market.

whyChooseSection.title: Why Choose BuyonTech for Your Next Big Idea?

cards.title: Strong Expertise
cards.description: Our team brings years of experience to deliver reliable and innovative solutions.

cards.title: End-to-End Solutions
cards.description: From idea to launch — we handle every stage of your digital journey, ensuring a smooth and scalable transformation for your business.

cards.title: Creative Vision
cards.description: We design with imagination and purpose — crafting digital identities that inspire trust and make your brand stand out.

cards.title: Reliability & Transparency
cards.description: We value long-term partnerships built on trust, open communication, and consistent delivery of high-quality results.

cards.title: Innovation-Driven Approach
cards.description: At BuyonTech, innovation isn’t an add-on — it’s our core. We use modern technologies and smart strategies to move your ideas forward.

cards.title: Global Mindset
cards.description: We think beyond borders — delivering digital products and campaigns that perform globally while staying authentic to your brand.

firstSection.description: We help your brand grow with smart strategies and engaging content.

secondSection.paragraph: Our story is built on creativity and strategy that make every campaign stand out. We combine data-driven insights with fresh ideas to craft marketing that works. From small startups to established brands, we adapt our approach to fit every need. Discover how we help businesses grow and why so many trust us.

q1.qu: How do you develop your marketing strategy?
q1.a: We craft our strategy based on business objectives and audience behavior.Through competitor and market analysis, customer journey mapping, and data-driven insights, we build a unified marketing ecosystem.Our goal is not just visibility — but measurable conversion and ROI.

q2.qu: What results do your SEO services deliver?
q2.a: Our SEO approach enhances search visibility, organic traffic, and brand credibility.Through technical optimization, content strategy, and backlink building, we continuously monitor and refine performance.Our focus is not traffic growth — but creating real business value.

q3.qu: How do you determine the pricing for your marketing services?
q3.a: Our pricing depends on project goals, scale, and chosen marketing channels.We apply a value-based approach — building proposals around ROI and measurable outcomes.Transparent and flexible pricing models are used — retainer, campaign-based, or performance-based.

q4.qu: How does social media marketing impact my business?
q4.a: We use social media to strengthen brand visibility and customer loyalty.By building tailored content, ad, and communication strategies for your audience, we create meaningful engagement.The goal — to form an active community and drive real sales impact.

q5.qu: How do you optimize advertising budgets?
q5.a: We allocate budgets dynamically based on platform performance and audience behavior.Using AI-driven analytics and A/B testing, we focus on the highest-converting channels.The result: maximum impact with minimum cost.

cards.title: Creative Approach
cards.description: We bring fresh ideas and storytelling into every campaign to make your brand stand out.

cards.title: Data Driven
cards.description: Our strategies are backed by research and analytics to ensure measurable growth.

cards.title: Client Focus
cards.description: We work closely with you, tailoring every step to your goals and building lasting partnerships.

marketingServices.title: Services
marketingServices.digitalDesc: Daily management of Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and LinkedIn pages.
marketingServices.brandingDesc: Developing logos, color palettes, and overall brand strategy.
marketingServices.productionDesc: High-quality promotional materials for products and services.
marketingServices.socialDesc: Daily management of Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and LinkedIn pages.
marketingServices.contentDesc: Creative production of photos, videos, and graphic design materials.
marketingServices.analyticsDesc: Tracking ad campaign performance and delivering monthly reports.
marketingServices.strategyDesc: Building a long-term marketing roadmap tailored to business goals.
marketingServices.seoDesc: We enhance your online visibility with effective SEO solutions tailored to your business.

firstSection.title: From Vision to Impact — We Make Digital Dreams Work.
firstSection.text: Through design, code, and marketing, we turn bold ideas into digital experiences that inspire, perform, and last.

secondSection.description: Every project, every client, and every result tells our story — built on trust, creativity, and performance.

thirdSection.visionText: Our vision is to become the most trusted creative and technological partner in the regional market. By building the digital ecosystem of the future, Buyontech aims to create a global bridge of success for businesses, standing out through innovation in both marketing and web development.
thirdSection.missionText: Our mission is to accelerate business growth – by combining innovative marketing solutions with modern web technologies, we provide entrepreneurs with both a strong brand presence and a solid digital infrastructure. At Buyontech, our goal is to transform every client’s idea into tangible results.
